mapper.select: select i.id,softwareName,APKName,softwareSize,flatformId,interfaceLanguage,downloads,appInfo, (select flatformName from flatform where id=flatformId) flatformName, categoryLevel1,(select categoryName from app_category where id=categoryLevel1) categoryName1, categoryLevel2,(select categoryName from app_category where id=categoryLevel2) categoryName2, categoryLevel3,(select categoryName from app_category where id=categoryLevel3) categoryName3, status,logoPicPath,logoLocPath ,downloads,versionNo from app_info i inner join app_version v where i.versionId=v.id and i.id=#{id}
select * from app_version v,app_info i where v.id=i.versionId
select * from app_version v where appId=#{id} and versionNo = (select MAX(versionNo) from app_version where v.appId=appId)
